item.title: Awesome Websites
item.description: Git related https://docs.gitea.io/en-us/ gitlab.com https://codeberg.org/ https://sourcehut.org/ https://git.disroot.org/ (https://disroot.org/en) so let’s talk about disroot for a second, they have a ton of services for example share file encryped create a file that you can collaborate on , ect AND NO you dont always need an account! https://github.com/MichaelMure/git-bug https://github.com/jmforsythe/Git-Heat-Map https://github.com/arxanas/git-branchless https://github.com/initialcommit-com/git-sim (mac) https://github.com/gitx/gitx https://docs.gitstream.cm/ https://initialcommit.com Ai related jupytext
